page.title: 03THE VILLAGE
page.content: {Population}Of about 120 inhabitants 99 are on the Electoral Roll. {Occupations}Farming (there is actually one Dairy Farm in the village), Quarrying at Ballidon, and others commute to Ashbourne and Derby {Shopping}is done at Ashbourne or Derby {Schools}There are very few children in the village. The Juniors attend school in Brassington, and Seniors go to Ashbourne or Wirksworth. {Doctor}The nearest is at Ashbourne. The{Church}of All Saints,Bradbourne with Ballidon is still the social centre of the village. {Dwellings}The 36 buildings include a Hall, a converted school and 4/5 holiday homes. There is little feeling of village life because many people only use Bradbourne as a place to live in, or visit for a short period each year.
